name: com.unity.meshsync
description: Working together with MeshSyncDCCPlugin, MeshSync provides features to reflect changes to models made in DCC tools into Unity in real time

upm.changelog: ### Added,* feat: show SceneCachePlayer basic info in the inspector,* feat: add extrapolation capabilities for SceneCachePlayableAsset,* feat: override LimitedAnimation in SceneCachePlayableAsset,### Changed,* change: the default frames to hold for Limited Animation to 2,### Fixed,* fix: set the in and out tangent of the keys of SceneCachePlayableAsset,* fix: properly create SceneCachePlayableAsset clips when the SceneCachePlayer object is disabled ,* fix: clamp frameOffset after setting num frames to hold for limited animatio,* fix: hide fields in the inspector SceneCachePlayableAsset for invalid SceneCache
